creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: stylized leaning tree with swirling texture on trunk; thick, brambly branches obscure much of the trunk; small leaves
inscription:
Signature

in graphite on recto, bottom of sheet: Branches - ca 1880 / 1st Edition on chine colle / Rodolphe Bresdin / 1822-1885
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed in plate, lower left: [RB] and [R Bresdin]
title: Branches
